5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Abu Sha'tha' al-Muharibi reported on the authority of his father, who said:I heard it from Abu Huraira that he saw a person getting out of the mosque after the call to prayer had been announced. Upon this he remarked: This (man) disobeyed Abu'l-Qasim (ﷺ)

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ الْخُرُوجِ، مِنَ الْمَسْجِدِ إِذَا أَذَّنَ الْمُؤَذِّنُ
chapter.eng-name: The prohibition of leaving the masjid once the Mu’adhdhin has called the Adhan
